rev.comment: Protogon seems to be a codename... please revert if that is not true
rev.diff:
Line 36: Line 36:
==Protogon Filesystem==
==Protogon Filesystem==
â
Windows 8 will supposedly support a new filesystem called [[Protogon]]. Not much is published about the new filesystem. The Developer Preview of Windows 8 harbors [[Windows registry|registry]] references regarding Protogon. Certain builds of Windows 8 supposedly allow users to [[Disk formatting|format]] a [[Disk partitioning|partition]] with the Protogon filesystem.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.neowin.net/news/windows-8-new-protogon-filesystem-could-be-the-next-big-thing |title=Windows 8: New "Protogon" filesystem could be the next big thing |publisher=Neowin.net |date= |accessdate=2011-09-16}}</ref>
+
Windows 8 will supposedly support a new filesystem codenamed [[Protogon]]. Not much is published about the new filesystem. The Developer Preview of Windows 8 harbors [[Windows registry|registry]] references regarding Protogon. Certain builds of Windows 8 supposedly allow users to [[Disk formatting|format]] a [[Disk partitioning|partition]] with the Protogon filesystem.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.neowin.net/news/windows-8-new-protogon-filesystem-could-be-the-next-big-thing |title=Windows 8: New "Protogon" filesystem could be the next big thing |publisher=Neowin.net |date= |accessdate=2011-09-16}}</ref>
